body_html:
@davidzchen @jart

The comment before "construction_fails_op" makes it clear that it's a genuine testonly.

I can build just fine, but:

bazel query 'allpaths(//tensorflow/python:tf_session_helper, //tensorflow/python:construction_fails_op)'
//tensorflow/python:tf_session_helper
//tensorflow/python:construction_fails_op

And also some other test ops?

bazel query 'deps(//tensorflow/python:tf_session_helper) intersect //tensorflow/python/...'
//tensorflow/python:tf_session_helper
//tensorflow/python:test_ops_kernels
//tensorflow/python:numpy_lib
//tensorflow/python:construction_fails_op

I can't quite see why it should be the case.
